0101010100101010 0101101101011010 1 -> sum: 1011000010000101, cout: 0

0011011111101101 1101001111110101 1 -> sum: 0000101111100011, cout: 1
1111110001010101 1010010110101110 1 -> sum: 1010001000000100, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
